name: Stone Ball
description:
Stone Ball  is a game in which you play for a stone ball.
You have to wade through many trials and enemies to find other stones.
You can not fight the adversaries in any way and you will have to evade and avoid enemies.
The game has 3 music, you can off it.
In the game, simple controls that do not require a mouse, you can change it.
The game has beautiful graphics, but if you have problems with the frame rate, you can lower the graphics level by pressing Esc and off Shadow\PostProcessing\Tree&Grass.
